definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_isburning"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_remove_specific_potion_effect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Immolation</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amplifier</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">ON_FIRE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
